lexUnit.name: drink.v

corpus.description: Wall Street Journal Texts from the PropBank Project
corpus.name: PropBank

lexUnit.definition: COD: take (a liquid) into the mouth and swallow.

sentence.text: We was drinking beer so , of course , Charlie has to make us all feel small by paying for whiskies all round .
Jed drank two more beers and a couple of shots of tequila .
Hank silently drank down his beer , and hoped he had made the right move in telling his father .
Laidlaw drank another mouthful of beer .
Later that Christmas Gabriel had drunk a bottle of rum watching a pirate film on the television , and she had known then that , really , it was all over .

The two plain-clothes officers had drunk half a bottle of scotch and several cans of lager on the train journey from Glasgow to Telford to escort a prisoner back to Scotland , said Estelle Hindely , prosecuting .
They drank the whole bottle in perfect accord .
Patients drank a bottle of magnesium citrate each night and also received tap water enemas until the return was clear .
We drank coffee and talked some more .
Sir Thomas drank a lot of coffee , and as this is often given as an enema in atropine poisoning cases , it might have led to his being sick , perhaps even delayed the onset of symptoms .
You drink your coffee .
He drank from the little blue-and-white cup .
Rainbow waits in a room full of children drinking juice from plastic cups , who study her in silence .
They drank hot sake from tiny porcelain cups , and Rachel felt light-headed from the potent Japanese alcohol .
He drank a glass of white wine with it : French habits had stayed with him .
She drank the wine and placed the empty glass on the floor by the bed .
He drank his sherry from long glasses , diluted with water .
I drank mint tea in the carpet shops ( and found Stefan Grappelli , Bryan Ferry and Ben Kingsley listed in one shop 's order book ) .
A D Hopeprotested that Patrick White always wrote ` the ribbon of tea wound through him " instead of ` he drank a cup of tea " .
The three men drank their tea .
She munched her pastries and drank her tea and felt better for it , stronger , sharper , ready for battle .
For their part it was unnecessary as they only drank what had been boiled for tea or coffee , whereas I often drank water on its own or with fruit cordial . )
Diana replied : ` Well I must admit , partly make-up and I do drink lots of water . "

Moving still further inland , she dispensed with the trappings of the colonial lifestyle -- she drank unboiled water , used no mosquito-net , walked barefoot , and even went without the indispensable hat .
Rufus had a bottle of red wine but he was drinking the wine out of one of Hilbert 's brandy glasses .
She drank a little wine and noticed that the girl on Hamilton 's right was staring at her .
` He drank some wine from the same bottle you did , Sir John , but he was not in his cups ? "
Based on a London Mild recipe from 175O , the latter was originally drunk by London fish and market porters and was named after the brewer 's dog !
Here it is drunk with soda before dinner and straight after .
Men were lying on the dirty floor , a sailor was asleep on a table and two women were drinking at the bar .
Jane drank from the flask and began to speak .
` By the way , I understand there was a glass of water on the lectern , and Sir Thomas drank from it . "
They were drinking from pewter tankards .
An' if it gets too bad , your little girls can come and drink out of the swimming-pool .
Blanche drank off the last of her whisky , leaving a few pebbles of unmelted ice in the bottom of her glass .
He ate his way through bread and butter and ham and pickles and drank a half-pint of milk .
` Not a thing , love , but we made her drink the orange juice .
All three of them drank their cocoa with pleasure .
` Congratulations , both of you , " Belinda said sincerely , then Andrew proposed a rambling , outrageous toast and drank a long gulp of champagne with pretended sophistication .
She drank a good gulp of whisky .
5:09 a.m. JROE : The Sunset { District } was more or less like a pajama party all evening , lots of people & dogs walking around , drinking beer .
